Tesla Releases Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Releases Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results Business Wire Oct 22, 2025 AUSTIN, Texas, October 22, 2025 – Tesla has released its financial results for the third quarter of 2025 by posting an update on its Investor Relations website. Please visit https://ir.tesla.com to view the update. As previously announced, Tesla management will host a live question and answer (Q&amp;A) webcast at 4:30 p.m. Central Time (5:30 p.m. Eastern Time) to discuss the results and outlook. What: &nbsp;Tesla Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results Q&amp;A Webcast When:&nbsp; Wednesday, October 22, 2025 Time: 4:30 p.m. Central Time / 5:30 p.m. Eastern Time Q3 2025 Update: https://ir.tesla.com Webcast: https://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) The webcast will be archived on the company’s website following the call. Investor Relations Contact: ir@tesla.com Footer Tesla © 2026 Subscription Preferences Contact &amp; FAQ Privacy &amp; Legal
